title: TN APPA
description: TN APPA(Tamilnadu Anaithu Palli Parent-Teachers Association) is the official mobile application for the Tamil Nadu State Parents Teachers Association (PTA), designed to improve communication between parents, teachers, and school administration. This platform serves as a centralized hub for sharing important updates related to Parent-Teacher Associations, school announcements, and government educational policies
descriptionHTML: TN APPA(Tamilnadu Anaithu Palli Parent-Teachers Association) is the official mobile application for the Tamil Nadu State Parents Teachers Association (PTA), designed to improve communication between parents, teachers, and school administration. This platform serves as a centralized hub for sharing important updates related to Parent-Teacher Associations, school announcements, and government educational policies
summary: Stay updated on PTA meetings, school policies, and education news.
developerLegalName: TAMILNADU STATE MISSION OF EDUCATION FOR ALL SAMAGRA SHIKSHA
developerLegalAddress: State Project Directorate Samagra Shiksha Dpi Campus College Road, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600006, India
recentChanges: Tamilnadu Anaithu Palli Parent-Teachers Association App Release
